mapper.select: SELECT sh.id as id, c.scrip as scrip, sh.total_buy_quantity as totalBuyQuantity, sh.total_sell_quantity as totalSellQuantity, sh.total_buy_amount as totalBuyAmount, sh.total_sell_amount as totalSellAmount, sh.holding_quantity as holdingQuantity, sh.current_investment as currentInvestment, CASE WHEN sh.holding_quantity = 0 THEN 0 WHEN sh.total_sell_amount - sh.total_buy_amount > 0 THEN 0 ELSE sh.wacc END AS wacc, shi.ltp * sh.holding_quantity as currentValue, shi.ltp as ltp FROM stock_holdings sh INNER JOIN companies c on sh.company_id = c.id INNER JOIN stock_history shi on shi.company_id = sh.company_id INNER JOIN stock_market_history smh on shi.stock_market_history_id = smh.id WHERE smh.date = (SELECT max(smh1.date) FROM stock_market_history smh1) ORDER BY c.scrip;
